trans-unit.source: Locks a portion of a bitmap for reading or writing

seg-source.mrk: Locks a portion of a bitmap for reading or writing

target.mrk: Locks a portion of a bitmap for reading or writing

trans-unit.source: X coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle to lock

seg-source.mrk: X coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle to lock

target.mrk: X coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle to lock

trans-unit.source: Y coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle to lock

seg-source.mrk: Y coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle to lock

target.mrk: Y coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle to lock

trans-unit.source: The width of the rectangle to lock

seg-source.mrk: The width of the rectangle to lock

target.mrk: The width of the rectangle to lock

trans-unit.source: The height of the rectangle to lock

seg-source.mrk: The height of the rectangle to lock

target.mrk: The height of the rectangle to lock

trans-unit.source: [optional] Set of flags that specify whether the locked portion of the bitmap is available for reading or for writing and whether the caller has already allocated a buffer. Can be a combination of the following:

seg-source.mrk: Set of flags that specify whether the locked portion of the bitmap is available for reading or for writing and whether the caller has already allocated a buffer.
Can be a combination of the following:

target.mrk: Set of flags that specify whether the locked portion of the bitmap is available for reading or for writing and whether the caller has already allocated a buffer.
Can be a combination of the following:

trans-unit.source: $GDIP_ILMREAD - A portion of the image is locked for reading

seg-source.mrk: $GDIP_ILMREAD - A portion of the image is locked for reading

target.mrk: $GDIP_ILMREAD - A portion of the image is locked for reading

trans-unit.source: $GDIP_ILMWRITE - A portion of the image is locked for writing

seg-source.mrk: $GDIP_ILMWRITE - A portion of the image is locked for writing

target.mrk: $GDIP_ILMWRITE - A portion of the image is locked for writing

trans-unit.source: $GDIP_ILMUSERINPUTBUF - The buffer is allocated by the user

seg-source.mrk: $GDIP_ILMUSERINPUTBUF - The buffer is allocated by the user

target.mrk: $GDIP_ILMUSERINPUTBUF - The buffer is allocated by the user

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies the format of the pixel data in the temporary buffer. Can be one of the following:

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the format of the pixel data in the temporary buffer.
Can be one of the following:

target.mrk: Specifies the format of the pixel data in the temporary buffer.
Can be one of the following:

trans-unit.source: $GDIP_PXF16RGB565 - 16 bpp; 5 bits red, 6 bits green, and 5 bits blue

seg-source.mrk: $GDIP_PXF16RGB565 - 16 bpp; 5 bits red, 6 bits green, and 5 bits blue

target.mrk: $GDIP_PXF16RGB565 - 16 bpp; 5 bits red, 6 bits green, and 5 bits blue

trans-unit.source: $GDIP_PXF16ARGB1555 - 16 bpp; 1 bit for alpha and 5 bits for each RGB component

seg-source.mrk: $GDIP_PXF16ARGB1555 - 16 bpp; 1 bit for alpha and 5 bits for each RGB component

target.mrk: $GDIP_PXF16ARGB1555 - 16 bpp; 1 bit for alpha and 5 bits for each RGB component

trans-unit.source: $GDIP_PXF32RGB - 32 bpp; 8 bits for each RGB. No alpha.
$GDIP_PXF32ARGB - 32 bpp; 8 bits for each RGB and alpha

seg-source.mrk: $GDIP_PXF32ARGB - 32 bpp; 8 bits for each RGB and alpha

target.mrk: $GDIP_PXF32ARGB - 32 bpp; 8 bits for each RGB and alpha

trans-unit.source: $GDIP_PXF32PARGB - 32 bpp; 8 bits for each RGB and alpha, pre-multiplied

seg-source.mrk: $GDIP_PXF32PARGB - 32 bpp; 8 bits for each RGB and alpha, pre-multiplied

target.mrk: $GDIP_PXF32PARGB - 32 bpp; 8 bits for each RGB and alpha, pre-multiplied

trans-unit.source: When you are done with the locked portion, call _GDIPlus_BitmapUnlockBits() to release the locked region.

seg-source.mrk: When you are done with the locked portion, call _GDIPlus_BitmapUnlockBits() to release the locked region.

target.mrk: When you are done with the locked portion, call _GDIPlus_BitmapUnlockBits() to release the locked region.
